review: There are a lot of things that I like about this device however, I recently used it on my jetpack while traveling and it used about 5 Gb of data in one hour of video (half of a movie).  It cost me $45 in data to watch half a movie. I have read that the apps and/or device can sense when you are on a network that is capable of higher bandwidths and will upgrade the video quality automatically. There is no way to turn this off or limit the video quality or data usage as per Amazon representative. The ASAP feature also supposedly uses a ton of data. Kind of funny how much data this device uses and it really doesn't make much sense. Makes one wonder if it isn't collecting data on its users.
